sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_post_comments (comment_no, comment_emp_no, comment_content, comment_post_no) values (comm_comments_seq.nextval, #employee.empNo#, #content#, #post.postNo#)
sqlMap.select: select A.comment_no as reviewNo, A.comment_emp_no as "employee.empNo", A.comment_content as content, A.comment_deleted as deleted, A.comment_post_no as "post.postNo", A.comment_created_date as createdDate, A.comment_updated_date as updatedDate, B.emp_name as "employee.name" from comm_post_comments A, comm_employees B where A.comment_post_no = #value# and A.comment_emp_no = B.emp_no and A.comment_deleted = 'N' order by A.comment_post_no desc

select comment_no as reviewNo, comment_emp_no as "employee.empNo", comment_content as content, comment_deleted as deleted, comment_post_no as "post.postNo", comment_created_date as createdDate, comment_updated_date as updatedDate from comm_post_comments where comment_no = #value#
sqlMap.update: update comm_post_comments set comment_deleted = #deleted#, comment_deleted_date = sysdate where comment_no = #reviewNo#
sqlMap.select: select comment_no as reviewNo, comment_emp_no as "employee.empNo", comment_content as content, comment_deleted as deleted, comment_post_no as "post.postNo", comment_created_date as createdDate, comment_updated_date as updatedDate from comm_post_comments where comment_emp_no = #value#
select count(*) from comm_post_comments where comment_deleted = 'N' and comment_emp_no = #value#
